Blog.post: yupz..juz cam back frm my everdearest & funniest granddaughter bbq..she arh still say WAD..y jess,bee bee & me go home so early..then i was lyk..no..no..its getting late..lets tok frm the start of morning..i wok up at bout 9.30 then eat my breakfast..oni maggie mee..after eating for quite a while..hasyimah called to ask if i'm going yen kheng's bbq..i was lyk..of course..she my everdearest granddaughter..of course i would go..& y din anyone answer the phone when she called yesterday..then i was lyk..i was baby-sitting my baby cousin hu is aso my baobei..lyk the whole day..tts y she couldn't find me..after tt..bout 11.15..my mama asked me would i lyk sum handmade noodles..so i wanted to try & i said yes..but after cooking..iwas lyk..got veggies..then she was lyk muz eat..so i ate..the noodles were nice but wif the veggies..it becam funni..then my mum fetch me & jess to yen kheng's house bus-stop..cause jess meeting me at her hse opp bus-stop at 12.30..them my mimi aso say wan to fetch us there as she going my ah ma hse to help my uncle look after baby cousin..kassey..so we went kheng's hse..then her papa told her tt her frienz are here when she's still in the room..but she dun believe as she already changed the venue to her hse void deck..then she cam out..saw us tot she saw wrongly..lyk "arh..y the two of u cam my hse when i already changed the venue"..so she ask us if anyone has told us tt she change venue..then we say..if we noe, we wun com your hse..rite..then she say..ya hor..then she keep scolding me y yesterday she call..no one at home..then i muz repeat wad i said to hasyimah..then when she com out of the hse..i hit her butt as she was being funni to her parents..her father is those kind of funni funni person..then her mum is those very very strict person..then when we went down..no one was there yet..so we waited..hasyimah cam after us when she's supposed to com earlier than jess & me..then jac & stead..then charlton & shirley wif jess lim..charlton's ah bu..then bee bee..wanted to go liaoz..but then jac & stead wif jess wanted to wait for tt tiffanie or wadeva to settle jess things..so we waited..& wad..waited for bout 45 mins..then when tiffanie & her frien com..everyone wanted to sie( dunno wad spelling)her..then bout 45 mins..settle liaoz..tts wad they say..so we go liaoz..all took cab..kheng,hasyimah,bee bee & me together..then i dunno liaoz..we four go white sands buy thingys..then go gather..at bout 5..they all start fire when hasyimah realize tt her thingys has been eaten..so bee bee,hasyimah,jess & me went white sands again to buy..bee bee & jess went to but alcohol..then went we went back..kheng was a bit unhappy cause she said no alcohol allowed..but her anger is gone after a while..as we're one FAMILY..so we wun be angry wif each othe 4 long..then later..tok lots of photos..then i ganna sabo so kheng & charlton take sum of the cake and applied on my face..a bit angry at first..but then as we are one family..so..i was not angry for long..then after eating..hasyimah,jac & charlton went to swim while kheng go meet her godbrother..they cam back after bout 15 mins..might as well dun go swim..then they went to bathe..oni me,jac's stead,bee bee & jess at the bbq pit..so i asked shirley y salina diao her as charlton told me salina diao her dear dear..sch reopens..will ask salina to settle & say sorry to her..& she'd better if not i dunno wad will happen to her..she'd better not anger me..if not..she'll get to noe..k..tts bout all..bye folks..tc everyone.. To yen kheng:thankz for inviting ah ma to ur bbq..its very sweet of u to invite me..a very HAPPIE B-DAY..its the happiest bbq i've had..a big THANK YOU.. To hasyimah,bee bee,jess wong,charlton,shirley,jac & stead,jess lim & yen kheng espeially:thankz for letting me spend a realli realli happie day wif all of u..i'm relli glad tt i haf all of u as my granddaughters & grandsons..love all of ya..

reach sch at bout 7am.. went locker.. go for morning assembly.. in class..sad..boring.. so slept in class.. went recess.. bang into papa & yj when going up to classes.. ask papa cut hair..papa say no time.. then went for classes.. slept throughout again.. after sch.. went rm wif hasyimah..amanda..amelia.. eat at kfc.. ate cheesefries..drank mountain dew.. go toilet..sew belt.. went back sch..thought of going art..home.. saw tricia..whole group.. ask tricia cut my hair.. no scissors..no cutting of hair.. saw yj come out of art.. suddenly wanted to cry.. tricia still can ask me.. yj's clay nice a not.. walk the three of them to 136 bus-stop.. walk to 82 bus-stop myself.. walk back to sch again.. saw yj..eyes full of tears.. saw nobody at art except rebecca.. tok to her bout yj..nick..jay.. when tok bout yj.. cried in front of rebecca.. ate nth at art..no mood.. sang lots of sad songs.. recongised rebecca as my xiao di.. tt means she muz call me da jie.. after art.. ask xiao di walk wif me outside sch..

wherever.. whatever i doing.. every min.. every second.. juz can't get u out of the mind.. i miss u even when i see u.. wat should i do.. ppl.. tell me.. so happie.. got another xiao di.. gonna haf another xiao mei.. i think so.. feel like going mama's chalet.. but.. she going.. dun feel like seeing her.. i scared i'll cry.. so.. better not go.. juz give present to mama.. and.. tts all.. dun need to see her.. juz calculated.. haf to buy 3 presents.. in october.. 1 present in nov.. going to tok to nephew.. bye
hiyee.. here to say.. HAPPIE B-DAY S'PORE.. missed the fireworks.. missed JJ.. missing more of you.. tis the third day.. yupz.. finally can see u.. the day after..

everything is fine.. until.. xiao di told me something.. i blew up my top.. pls.. a bung tok to another girl.. is it considered flirting.. so stupid.. xiao di say.. its.. magdeline told her de.. aniwae.. juz think it mag say de.. better watch out..

sad.. why.. never get to really see her.. think oni during recess.. every lesson is boring todae.. because non of them i understand.. i even forget wad lessons i had.. oni remember ss.. cause i like the teacher.. cause its at least the bit interesting.. at least we got to write esssays.. think its good.. cause i'm really bad in it.. tt physics teacher.. cannot stand him liaoz.. dun believe us.. saying tt we lie to him bout the tracking booklet.. thn say he dun wanna sign.. he made remarks.. dun tell me tt ur class is really tt bad.. stupid fucking teacher.. after sch.. came home straight.. done nth.. stupid sis.. dun wanna give me eat nacho cheese thinggy.. so irritating.. thn she went to my bag.. ransack it.. went over everything.. i screamed at her until haf sorethroat now.. uneasy so feeling.. doing f&n now.. cannot find anithing.. how.. need to pass up tml.. if not.. die.. dunnoe what should i cook.. jasmine fried rice..potato & carrot soup.. tricia's favourite.. thai fried vermicelli..thai tom yam.. how.. so confusing.. bye.. going to do it now.. take care.. everyone..

sianz.. never see her until after sch.. tricia told me tt if i'm not booked todae.. my name is not chen min.. cause i hafn't done my chinese corrections.. half asleep in class.. slept at 12++ last night.. never tok to ticia tt much todae.. was doing chinese corrections in physics.. asshole..fucking bastard.. he dun wanna sign my tracking booklet.. i forgot to write my name.. thn forget it lar.. dun sign thn dun sign.. juz told ms chan the truth.. she cannot even be bothered.. aniwae..its not my fault.. i dun wanna tok bout him.. recess..saw papa wif yj buying drinks.. got a little sad again.. i think i siow.. in chinese..never get booked.. told tricia..she juz sort of laugh.. teacher kept saying his stories.. so LAME.. after sch..went to let teachers check bags.. they suspect us of stealing money.. tt girl lost more than $100.. so it cannot be me.. i oni haf $1.30 left.. they retain those hu haf more than tt.. they call their parents to clarrify.. sort of stupid.. went down to canteen.. saw papa..shikin..amelia.. went toilet wif mama.. tok to papa & mama2nd.. yj came down after chineses remedial.. tok..felt happie.. yj very furnni.. dare not look at me.. when toking to her.. went home.. saw lily tan.. kept toking to me bout farewell thingy.. so irritating.. nun of my business.. tok to tricia juz now.. a while oni.. my real mama scolding.. haf to put the phone down.. so irritated.. wanted to tok to her bout yj.. doing my f&n now.. cannot find anithing.. hafn't even touch my sis's work for me.. die if she comes back before i sleep.. so better tac into bed now.. bye.. tc.. niteZ..
